title: $:/plugins/bj/closedlist
author: JeffreyWilkinson aka bj
text:
{"tiddlers":{"ListClosedCreate":{"title":"ListClosedCreate","text":"<$createclip> <$button> create new List <$action-tiddlydo $tabletid="$:/bj/closedlist" $catname="MakeNewList"/>
    <$list filter="[tag]" class='btn btn-primary'>
  • {{!!title||listtickettemplate}}
"},"$:/bj/NewListRule":{"title":"$:/bj/NewListRule","text":"\rules only table wikilink prettylink |!Title|!Body|!Tags|!Fields modifiers|!field initials|!Modes| $tags=((*@inset(#mastertags,@newtag)*??*@addsets(#tags,@newtag)*??*@abort()*)) "},"$:/bj/AddsubtagRule":{"title":"$:/bj/AddsubtagRule","text":"\rules only table wikilink prettylink "},"$:/bj/closedlistdockrequest":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlistdockrequest","type":"application/x-bclip","text":"#conf:={{$:/bj/closelistclipconfig}} #tcconf:={{TiddlyClipConfig}} #title=testingtitle #dock=dock $test=((*@send(#dock,#config,#aux)*)) "},"$:/bj/closedlist":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist","text":"|!Category|!Tip|!Tags|!Rule Tid|!Modes| "},"$:/bj/closelistclipconfig":{"title":"$:/bj/closelistclipconfig","text":"!((*@section*)) |!Category|!Tip|!Tags|!Rule Tid|!Modes| |Snippy|Copy||[[$:/bj/WebTextclosedlist]]|note| |Snappy|screen "},"$:/bj/closedlist/EditTemplate/body/changer":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/EditTemplate/body/changer","text":"\define frame-classes() tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-edit-frame $(missingTiddlerClass)$ $(shadowTiddlerClass)$ $(systemTiddlerClass)$ \end \define editbody(vtemplate)
>> <$set name="storyTiddler" value=<>> <$keyboard key={{$:/config/shortcuts/cancel-edit-tiddler}} message="tm-cancel-tiddler"> <$keyboard key={{$:/config/shortcuts/save-tiddler}} message="tm-save-tiddler"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditTemplate]!has[draft.of]!title[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body]] [title[$vtemplate$]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
\end <> "},"$:/bj/closedlist/EditTemplate/body/list":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/EditTemplate/body/list","text":"<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-tiddler-body" type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$vars parentTiddler=<>> <$list filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]sort[title]]" class='btn btn-primary'> {{!!title||$:/bj/closedlist/listedit}} "},"$:/bj/closedlist/listedit":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/listedit","text":"\define parentappend(y) $y$$(parentTiddler)$
<$linkcatcher message="refresh" to=<> > <$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="match"><$link to=""><$view field="title"/><$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="nomatch"> <$link><$view field="title"/>
<$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="match"> <$edit-html tiddler=<> subtiddler=<>mode="block"/> "},"$:/bj/inset.js":{"title":"$:/bj/inset.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/bj/inset.js type: application/javascript tags: $:/tags/tiddlyclip module-type: library \*/ exports.name ="inset"; exports.run = function(base,ext) { var found, i, j, oldbase=base.split(','); found = false; for (j=0;j> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> <$element-tag$ $element-attributes$ class="tc-tag-label tc-btn-invisible" style=<>> $actions$<$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/> <$view tiddler=<<__tag__>> field="title" format="text" /> \end \define tag-pill-body(tag,icon,colour,palette,element-tag,element-attributes,actions) <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-inner" tag=<<__tag__>> icon="""$icon$""" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}} element-tag="""$element-tag$""" element-attributes="""$element-attributes$""" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end \define tag-pillbj(tag,element-tag:"span",element-attributes:"",actions:"") <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag=<<__tag__>> icon={{{ [<__tag__>get[icon]] }}} colour={{{ [<__tag__>get[color]] }}} palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$element-tag$""" element-attributes="""$element-attributes$""" actions="""$actions$"""/> \end "},"$:/plugins/bj/closedlist/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/bj/closedlist/readme","text":"Enables tiddlers inside plugin type containers to be individually viewed and edited. All contained tiddlers are shown as a list Needs the typestemplate plugin. For edit, Needs ckeditor with subtiddler extension and multtid tools ($:/plugins/bj/struc) "},"$:/bj/RemovesubtagRule":{"title":"$:/bj/RemovesubtagRule","text":"\rules only table wikilink prettylink |!Title|!Body|!Tags|!Fields|!Initvals|!Modes| |((*@tiddler*))->((*@subtiddler*))|||{"#tags":"((*$tags*))"},{"$tags":"((*@subtractset(#tags,@tag)*))"}||add append| "},"$:/bj/macros/closedlisttime":{"title":"$:/bj/macros/closedlisttime","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define closedlisttime(limit:"100",format:"DDth MMM YYYY",subtag:"",dateField:"modified",template)
<$vars currentTag="$tag$"> <$list filter="[plugintagsub[$subtag$]eachday[$dateField$]]"> <$view tiddler=<> subtiddler =<> field="$dateField$" format="date" template="$format$"/> <$vars mysameday=<" subtiddler:"" field:"$dateField$" >>> <$list filter="[plugintagsub[$subtag$]sameday:$dateField$]"> {{||$template$}}
\end "},"$:/bj/macros/closedlisttimeold":{"title":"$:/bj/macros/closedlisttimeold","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define closedlisttimeold(limit:"100",format:"DDth MMM YYYY",subfilter,dateField:"modified",template)
<$vars currentTag="$tag$"> <$list filter="[plugin$subfilter$eachday[$dateField$]]"> <$view tiddler=<> subtiddler =<> field="$dateField$" format="date" template="$format$"/> <$vars mysameday=<" subtiddler:"" field:"$dateField$" >>> <$list filter="[plugin$subfilter$sameday:$dateField$]"> {{||$template$}}
\end "},"$:/bj/closedlist/ViewTemplate/body/changer":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/ViewTemplate/body/changer","text":"\define frame-classes() tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-view-frame $(missingTiddlerClass)$ $(shadowTiddlerClass)$ $(systemTiddlerClass)$ $(tiddlerTagClasses)$ \end \define folded-state() $:/state/folded/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define viewbody(vtemplate) <$set name="storyTiddler" value=<>><$set name="tiddlerInfoState" value=<>><$tiddler tiddler=<>>
>><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]!has[draft.of]!title[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body]] [title[$vtemplate$]]" variable="listItem"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>
\end <> "},"$:/bj/closedlist/ViewTemplate/body/list":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/ViewTemplate/body/list","text":"<$createclip> <$button> Dock <$action-tiddlydo $tabletid= "$:/bj/closedlist" $catname="MakeDock" section=<> tags={{!!tagoptions}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="show">by tags <$list filter="[tag[ListWidget]sort[title]]"/> <$vars parentTiddler=<>> <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="hide">all <$vars listTiddler="notag">{{||$:/bj/closedlist/viewtemplate/notag}} <$list filter="[enlist{!!ctags}]" variable="listTiddler">{{||$:/bj/closedlist/viewtemplate/tags}} <$vars parentTiddler=<> empty=""""""> <$set name="subtag" filter="[all[current]field:state[notag]]" value="{{!!null}}" emptyValue={{!!state}}> <$reveal type="match" state="!!state" text="notag"> <$macrocall $name="closedlisttime" format="DDth MMM YYYY" dateField="modified" template="$:/bj/closedlist/listview" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!state" text="notag"> <$macrocall $name="closedlisttime" format="DDth MMM YYYY" dateField="modified" template="$:/bj/closedlist/listviewremovetag" subtag=<> /> "},"$:/bj/closedlist/listview":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/listview","text":"\define parentappend(y) $y$$(parentTiddler)$ \define addsubtag-actions() <$action-tiddlydo $tabletid="$:/bj/closedlist" $catname="addtag" subtiddler=<> tiddler=<> newtag=<>/> \end
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}<$bj-action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> $subtiddler=<>/> <$linkcatcher message="refresh" to=<> > <$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="match"> <$link to=""><$view tiddler=<> subtiddler=<> field="title"/> <$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="nomatch"> <$link><$view tiddler=<> subtiddler=<> field="title"/>
<$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="match"> <$createclip> <$droppable actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler=<>mode="block"/> source is <$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler=<> field="source"/> "},"$:/bj/closedlist/listviewremovetag":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/listviewremovetag","text":"\define parentappend(y) $y$$(parentTiddler)$ \define addsubtag-actions() <$action-tiddlydo $tabletid="$:/bj/closedlist" $catname="addtag" subtiddler=<> tiddler=<> newtag=<>/> \end \define removesubtag-actions() <$action-tiddlydo $tabletid="$:/bj/closedlist" $catname="removetag" subtiddler=<> tiddler=<> tag=<>/> \end
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$bj-action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> $subtiddler=<>/> <$action-tiddlydo /> <$linkcatcher message="refresh" to=<> > <$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="match"> <$link to=""><$view tiddler=<> subtiddler=<> field="title"/> <$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="nomatch"> <$link><$view tiddler=<> subtiddler=<> field="title"/> <$createclip> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" action=<>> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}<$action-tiddlydo $tabletid="$:/bj/closedlist" $catname="removetag" subtiddler=<> tiddler=<> tag=<>/>
<$reveal state=<> text={{!!title}} type="match"> <$createclip> <$droppable actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler=<>mode="block"/> source is <$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler=<> field="source"/> "},"$:/bj/closedlist/viewtemplate/notag":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/viewtemplate/notag","text":"\whitespace trim \define addfld(b) $(currentTiddler)$$b$ \end <$vars parentTiddler=<>> <$set name="color" filter="[all[current]field:state]" value="red" emptyValue=""> <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag=<> icon={{!!icon}} colour=<> palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$button""" element-attributes="""set= <> setTo=<> tag='span'"""/> "},"$:/bj/closedlist/viewtemplate/tags":{"title":"$:/bj/closedlist/viewtemplate/tags","text":"\whitespace trim \define addfld(b) $(currentTiddler)$$b$ \end <$vars parentTiddler=<>> <$set name="color" filter="[all[current]field:state]" value="red" emptyValue=""> <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <$draggable tiddler=<> tag="scan"> <$macrocall $name="tag-pill-body" tag=<> icon={{!!icon}} colour=<> palette={{$:/palette}} element-tag="""$button""" element-attributes="""set= <> setTo=<> tag='span'"""/> "}}}
